p: 2D and 3D neural tissues were engineered from human induced pluripotent neural stem cells (GSC-4311, MTI-GlobalStem, Thermo Fisher Scientific, Switzerland) and contained a mixed population of mature neurons and glial cells [ 64]. 2D cultures were inoculated with 10 7 viral RNA copies (in 100 μl of culture medium). Residual inoculum was removed after 1 h and tissues were lysed 1 hpi and 5 dpi for RNA extraction. 3D cultures were inoculated with 4*10 7 viral RNA copies (in 40 μl of medium) and tissues were lysed 4 hpi or 5 dpi for RNA extraction.
